CustomField.description: Used to show CP or PP Box and its contents based on the Language Column value. The user's language attribute is matched with Community User Local Settings.USER_LANGLOCALEKEY to derive the value for USER_LANGUAGE and this gets matched to Portal Home Page Boxe.Language__c to filter the Boxes in addition to Permission Sets.(Lite Portal & Partner Portal controllers)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: CP or PP Box and its contents based on the Language Column value. User.Language AND USER_LANGLOCALEKEY => USER_LANGUAGE. USER_LANGUAGE AND Portal Home Page Box.Lanugage__c filters the Boxes to be shown. (Lite Portal & Partner Portal controllers)
CustomField.label: USER_LANGUAGE
